author: rmannibucau
msg: updating openjpa version to avoid warniing in archetype

author: danielsh
msg: When the separator line between two entries is missing or contains whitespace
(r'^\s+$' instead of r'^$'), svn-role would skip the entries and report parse
errors.  Instead, teach it to correct those separator lines and proceed.
Correction of separator lines is done in a dedicated commit.
(merge): Tweak the STATUS changes to make renormalization more often a noop.

author: danielsh
msg: Make all the global boolean knobs 0/1-valued, and introduce
a wrapper for use in merge()'s shell script.
($YES): Ditto, and note merge() would DTWT if "YES=0" was in the environment.

author: danielsh
msg: Force locale to a known value since we depend on it.
